trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute" />
When you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs only when an object is being deserialized with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>只有當物件要還原序列化的事件就會發生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。
